author: Nurse Fatima Al Zahra
subjective: Patient reports feeling well overall. Denies chest pain, shortness of breath, or palpitations. Blood pressure medication compliance good.
objective: Alert and oriented x3. Ambulating independently. No acute distress. Hypertension noted on BP reading.
plan: Continue current antihypertensive medication. Monitor BP q8h. Encourage lifestyle modifications.

author: Nurse Aisha Mohammed
subjective: No complaints. Reports taking medication as prescribed.
objective: Resting comfortably. Good medication compliance noted. No signs of cardiovascular distress.
plan: Continue monitoring. Patient education on diet and exercise reinforced.

author: Nurse Mariam Hassan
subjective: Reports good glucose control with current medication. No hypoglycemic episodes. Diet compliance good.
objective: Well-appearing female. No signs of diabetic complications. Feet examination normal.
assessment: Type 2 diabetes well controlled on Metformin.
plan: Continue current diabetes management. Monitor blood glucose. HbA1c pending.
